title: Single-cell transcriptomics reveals heterogeneity in tumor microenvironment
abstract: Understanding cellular heterogeneity in tumors is crucial for developing targeted therapies...

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Cancer is characterized by cellular heterogeneity that impacts treatment response...

sections.content: We performed single-cell RNA sequencing on 50,000 cells from 15 primary tumors...

sections.content: Our findings reveal unprecedented heterogeneity in the tumor microenvironment...
